Description: A supplier and former manufacturer of embalming chemicals has taken actions to increase public safety at its former Cambridge, Mass. facility, as well as at distribution warehouses in Texas, Illinois and California, under a settlement with EPA.

NAICS Translation: 423850: Service Establishment Equipment and Supplies Merchant Wholesalers
